projects.name: Billboard Sprite Game
projects.description: I had the idea of using gifs from https://gifcities.org/ as sprite assets for a game.I made an editor tool in Unity that can generate entities from spritesheets I created using a Python script.

projects.name: Guards
projects.description: A prototype for a multiplayer asymmetrical PVP stealth game with dynamic field of view. The gameplay turned out not to be much fun, but working on it was.

projects.name: Roguelike 3D
projects.description: This one was specifically about implementing the item wearing from Risk of Rain 2. You pick up an item, and it gets visually attached to your character.

projects.name: Asteroids Inspired Ship Game
projects.description: Another roguelike idea. This one was PSX stylized and would be based off of Asteroids.

projects.name: Breakfloor
projects.description: A Source 2 remake of the beloved Counter-Strike: Source gamemode from my childhood. You break the floor and it's loads of fun.

projects.name: One In The Chamber
projects.description: Like the Call of Duty gamemode.

projects.name: Grubs
projects.description: A worms-inspired artillery game for s&box with randomly generated levels. I contributed to this project via their Github and then for a few months as apart of the Ape Tavern organization.

projects.name: Trouble in Terrorist Town
projects.description: I contributed to this TTT remake on S&box. It was really fun to work on.
